title: The Gardening Wisdom of Linda Collins: A Heroic Week
summary: Linda Collins, a 71-year-old gardening consultant, discovers her unique abilities to influence plant growth which leads to heroic deeds throughout the community.
summaryGerman: Linda Collins, eine 71-jährige Gartenberaterin, entdeckt ihre einzigartigen Fähigkeiten, das Pflanzenwachstum zu beeinflussen, was zu heldenhaften Taten in der Gemeinschaft führt.
summaryDutch: Linda Collins, een 71-jarige tuinadviseur, ontdekt haar unieke vaardigheden om de plantengroei te beïnvloeden wat leidt tot heldendaden in de gemeenschap.
summaryFrench: Linda Collins, consultante en jardinage âgée de 71 ans, découvre ses capacités uniques à influencer la croissance des plantes, ce qui conduit à des actes héroïques au sein de la communauté.

story.text: Linda was sipping her morning tea when she noticed her roses flourishing unusually fast. Bewildered but pleased, she decided to investigate this anomaly.
As she experimented with her newfound powers, she discovered she could accelerate growth with just a touch. Excited, she began rejuvenating her neighbors' ailing plants.
News of Linda’s talent spread through the town. People lined up in her garden, seeking help for their plants. Feeling useful, she helped each one, spreading joy.
Linda helped the local park rejuvenate its old and withering trees. Kids played around, marveling at the lush, green landscapes that formed almost instantly.
Linda felt a bit overwhelmed by the constant requests for help. Despite the fatigue, she found solace in the significant impact she was making.
A small ceremony was held in her honor at the community center, where Linda shared tips on gardening and her love for nature. The community thanked her with a custom gardening toolkit.
Reflecting on her week, Linda realized the importance of balancing her life and her abilities. She decided to schedule specific times for community help, ensuring she also had time for herself.

ending: As the sun set on a serene Sunday, Linda Collins looked out over her thriving garden, feeling content with her harmonious blend of life and her extraordinary gift.
moral: Balance is key, even when you possess great power.
